reward-npc-visit: üéÅ Visit the reward NPC to claim your rewards!

npc.level-requirement: %COLOR_ERROR%You need to be level %COLOR_YELLOW%{level}%COLOR_ERROR% or higher to accept this quest!
npc.job-requirement: %COLOR_ERROR%You need to be a %COLOR_YELLOW%{job}%COLOR_ERROR% to accept this quest!
npc.mutually-exclusive: %COLOR_ERROR%You have already completed a mutually exclusive quest!

first-steps.name: First Steps
first-steps.description:
Welcome to the server!
Let's learn basic movement and interaction.

dialogs.welcome: Hello, new adventurer! Welcome to the world of Sypixel RPG!
dialogs.guide-intro: I'm your guide to help with your first steps. Let's learn the basics of this world together!
dialogs.ready-question: First, let's learn basic movement and interaction. Are you ready?
dialogs.accept: Great! Let's start the adventure together. First, come find me in the Hub area!
dialogs.decline: Not ready yet? Come back anytime when you're prepared!

basic-combat.name: Basic Combat
basic-combat.description:
Learn how to fight monsters.
Be careful, monsters are dangerous!

hunting.name: Daily Hunting
hunting.description:
Complete today's hunting objectives.
Resets daily at midnight.

gathering.name: Daily Gathering
gathering.description:
Gather today's required resources.
Resets daily at midnight.

fishing.name: Daily Fishing
fishing.description:
Complete today's fishing objectives.
Resets daily at midnight.

mining.name: Daily Mining
mining.description:
Complete today's mining objectives.
Resets daily at midnight.

crafting.name: Daily Crafting
crafting.description:
Complete today's crafting objectives.
Resets daily at midnight.

exploration.name: Daily Exploration
exploration.description:
Explore new areas and discover secrets.
Resets daily at midnight.

delivery.name: Daily Delivery
delivery.description:
Deliver items to various NPCs.
Resets daily at midnight.

bounty-hunter.name: Daily Bounty Hunter
bounty-hunter.description:
Hunt down today's target monsters.
Resets daily at midnight.
